10952.quoteText: If you are under 13, please do not attempt to download the Software and/or send or provide any personal information about yourself to us.
10952.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

10953.quoteText: We’re constantly trying to improve our Software, so we may need to change this Privacy Policy from time to time as well, but we will alert you to changes by placing a notice on justgetflux.com, by sending you a Notification (as described in more detail below), and/or by some other means.
10953.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

10956.quoteText: We may also automatically collect information such as geo-location data based on the IP address of your device(s).
10956.title: This service collects your IP address for location use

tosdr.case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

10957.quoteText: When we collect the usage information described above, we only use this data in aggregate form, and not in a manner that would identify you personally.
10957.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

10958.quoteText: You may be able to change the preferences on your browser or device to prevent or limit your device’s acceptance of cookies, but this may prevent you from taking advantage of some of our features.
10958.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

10960.quoteText: This Privacy Policy does not cover the use of cookies by any third parties, and we aren’t responsible for their privacy policies and practices.
10960.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

10961.quoteText: Also, if we (or our assets) are acquired, or if we go out of business, enter bankruptcy, or go through some other change of control, information could be one of the assets transferred to or acquired by a third party.
10961.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
